Running the example Ô¨Årst prints the total and daily scores for each model. We can see that
the weekly strategy performs better than the daily strategy and that the week one year ago
(week-oya) performs slightly better again. We can see this in both the overall RMSE scores for
each model and in the daily scores for each forecast day. One exception is the forecast error for
